storyInfo: After successfully rescuing the guide from Dublinn, Amiya and the Doctor assemble a squad and set off for a port in the Sudean Borough.

attributes.content: 8:15 A.M. \ Overcast
Several kilometers from Londinium, adjacent plate
Closure, we're getting a drone signal!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Move, move, lemme see!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ooh... Woah, that's not half bad. The newly added camera module is working properly and has great clarity within a hundred meters.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The battery life seems pretty stable too! Keep at it with this baby and we might even be able to get it over the wall and sneak a peek at what's going on inside...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hold on a sec, that's practically asking the enemy to shoot it out of the sky!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Don't you worry, I wouldn't put everybody at risk like that.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We've just gotta hurry up and develop that stealth coating...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure, the drone's sending an alert!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Got somebody within detection range... It's charging its automatic attack module.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wait, wait, that's the rescue team! Disable the alert!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Amiya, Doctor! Indra and Dagda are back!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Closure's drones are getting good.;......;Our scouts haven't found anyone yet.

attributes.content: They sure are. Closure's been totally focused on her drone research the whole way here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's trying to improve their recon capabilities so the enemy can't ambush us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That would be a big relief for you too, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After all, this is our first operation since coming to Londinium, and I... I'm still a little worried.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Drones can do a lot to improve our sightlines.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, once we get into Londinium, all the hard work Closure has put into her drones might really come in handy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because... most of us don't have the slightest idea of what's going on in there. We're going to need more eyes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Did it seem like Closure was kinda nervous?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She hasn't left the landship for operations much before. And that's before we talk about how none of us know how long we'll be here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But it's alright. I trust her, and I trust all our operators.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whether it's the roughly-a-dozen operators following us, or Misery and Logos's two teams that went ahead of us...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everyone signed up for this operation knowing exactly what we're here for.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So far, we've successfully completed phase one and phase two of the operation. Now, we need to focus on phase three––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Entering the city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: How are we going to infiltrate Londinium?;Are we going in through the structural level again?;If I'm scaling walls again, I'm gonna need a minute.

attributes.content: We're not getting into Londinium the same way we got inside the Chernobog core city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've got a visual on Londinium now, Doctor. Look at how high those walls are.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Nothing has ever managed to breach Londinium's defenses, not even Ursus's high-speed warships.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Londinium used to be the economic center of all Terra, as we all know, but only those who've seen the city with their own eyes understand its reputation as an impregnable fortress.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The waste drainage structures of most nomadic cities are vulnerable infiltration from the outside, but the engineers who built Londinium even made use of this weak point.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Reportedly, they built an automatic assembly line into the underground structure––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Back in Londinium's glory days, the machines worked day and night to perpetuate Victoria's golden age.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In times of war, the assembly lines supplied weapons and ammunition to the defense systems built into their towering walls.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The underground structure was designed so carefully that we wouldn't find a single gap in the engineering blueprints.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And that's assuming we'd even be able to get our hands on Londinium's blueprints. That's kind of impossible in and of itself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Then how did Logos and Misery get inside?;......;I thought Kal'tsit would be able to get us in.

attributes.content: Doctor, have some faith in our elite operators.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Blaze is an expert in high-mobility combat and Rosmontis is the core of our annihilation force, those two are masters of very particular Arts that are useful for infiltration missions.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Once you've seen Misery's Originium Arts in action, you'll understand what I mean.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You've probably heard Lava talk about 'Spatial Arts'... That's heading in the right direction of explaining Misery's Arts, but it's not the whole story.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Before joining Rhodes Island, he even managed to infiltrate the dynastic catacombs of ancient Sargon.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As for Logos... He has his own unique methods that require a specially trained caster.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I think, if there's a way for living things to get in and out of a city, there's no wall that could stop them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We also have another special operator joining us after we get into the city, but we probably won't be able to get in the same way she did.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm not too worried, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As you know, we have a plan. Once it's successfully put into motion, we'll all be much safer.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And even if this plan doesn't work, we have a backup plan, and another one after that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor... I know you're just trying to lighten the mood.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Over the last year or so, we've held hundreds of intelligence meetings, and almost a thousand tactical simulations... We all know how hard Dr. Kal'tsit worked to make this operation possible.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But there are some things we can't do, no matter how much effort we put in... and that's true for our uniquely talented elite operators, Rhodes Island itself, and even Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: So that's why you found us a guide.;I'm really glad we're not starting with a fight.

attributes.content: Right... I wanted to try something a bit safer first.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It brings to mind, Doctor, that meeting before we left, everyone was surprisingly on the same page here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if we had the Rhodes Island landship, we'd basically be trying to shatter a boulder by throwing eggs at it. That's what Londinium is to us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We should save our strength for the tougher enemies. They're waiting out there.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, I can feel everyone getting tenser each day we get closer to Londinium...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But no matter what happens next, we're all ready to fight.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: What about you, Amiya?;......;I'm worried about you too, Amiya.

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You already know. If we have to make a stand right here, it wouldn't be Closure doing it, or any of the operators who came here with their own ideals.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The responsibility is mine... Umm, though maybe it would be Siege's too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Indra.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're awake, Vina? You haven't gotten a wink of sleep all day. Might be good to get some shut-eye before we officially return to the city.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I can't sleep..
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Shouldn't Indra and Dagda be back already?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Heh. I don't even know if I should be jealous of those two. Even though they signed up for the job to buy you time to rest up, they just worry you anyway.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I should've gone with them. Ever since I came back, I can't close my eyes without seeing everything that happened back when we ran.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If they're in danger, I should be with them... No, I should be standing in front of them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Look, you... You always worry too much. They're just warming up a bit before their homecoming. How dangerous could it be?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Setting Dagda aside for now, did you see how fidgety Hannah looked? Hah.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: If you didn't give her a little task to help her blow off steam, I bet she wouldn't have been able to control herself. Probably would've punched someone the moment we got back into the city.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: She handles herself a lot better now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hmph. If that was true, she wouldn't be arguing back and forth with Dagda all the time. Even though she knows you haven't been sleeping well, she still won't shut up.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: How about it, Vina? Wanna sneak a peek at our old home while they're out?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: They only know how to throw fists. I'm the brains here, so I'm naturally the most reliable.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Why are you talking smack behind our backs again?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Look at that, Vina. Doesn't she seem more energetic than before?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: A laugh out of Vina?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You've been totally lost in thought this whole trip.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You idiot, why even talk about that? Do you know how hard it was for me to––
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Thank you, Morgan.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Except, I'd suggest you get some rest yourself. If I needed someone to manage my mood for me, I'd be a pretty useless leader.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Alright, sounds good to me.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Dagda.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You're bleeding?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm fine. It's not my blood.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I'm glad.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Those men... they were Dublinn, right? What'd you think of them?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: They're about as strong as a regular standing army. And, the one squad captain that Indra and I took down fought with combat techniques that very distinctly showed signs of Victorian military training.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: In other words...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We might actually be dealing with a coup of some kind.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Are they working with the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: They've no love for the Sarkaz. But that probably hasn't stopped them from forging a temporary alliance.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: They want to carve up Londinium. No, probably much more than just Londinium.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Those dukes out there... How many of them support Dublinn? And how many... support the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: For shame! They'd rather let the flags of foreign foes fly over Londinium than let go of their pitiful little power struggles, obsessed with their game of political tug-o'-war.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: These dukes and their troops are responsible for creating this crisis!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Now that we've come this far, it's finally time for us to put an end to this mess.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I've said it countless times: as a Knight of the Tower, my sword and I stand ready.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We're just waiting for you to lead us back to Londinium, and gather up all those willing to fight for you.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Dagda!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: We agreed to not talk about that until after we got back.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: But we're already at the gates of Londinium.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Didn't I tell you, Morgan? I'm not the only one who's sick of her. She's been acting a bit kooky lately, and she keeps blathering on about random nonsense.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hey, Dagda, you don't even carry a sword on you, and I don't care if you're a knight or not. Just don't forget what weapon you have in your hands, and whose side you're on!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't be too hard on her. Either of you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We... all have a past that we can't shrug aside. The reason we're all here today is precisely because we still have a score to settle.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I've told you before, Dagda, I don't want to let any of you down.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Siege...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I'm sorry. I swore to trust you... and I swore to trust that you'd make the right decisions. But, I lost myself today.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Don't blame yourself.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Our primary objective is still to enter Londinium with Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Is the one you rescued talking to Amiya right now?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yes. Balin took him to see Amiya and the Doctor.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Looks just like your average Londinier.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It could be a disguise.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: The Dublinn fighters said he used to work for the Sarkaz, but deserted them.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Those Sarkaz... I've fought them before. They killed the other Knights of the Tower...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Dagda.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm fine. But, we can't underestimate them. The fact that this guy managed to escape the city on their watch means he's probably more than meets the eye.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: If he really was that ordinary, Dublinn wouldn't care to abduct him, and Rhodes Island wouldn't be looking for him, right?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Let's head over and see what's going on.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I want to see... if he really can lead us into Londinium.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Amiya, there's a communication request on Blacksteel's channel.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Please put them through.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Did you get our signal? I'm sorry to say that by the time we got to the scene, the pilot Blacksteel hired was already dead.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How could this happen...?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Poor Thorpe... *sigh*, I'll let the rest of the team know.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: We also weren't able to retrieve the low-altitude aircraft. It was... um, destroyed during the battle.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh, that aircraft was rented... But, umm, that's not too big of a problem. We still have spare vehicles, so that won't disrupt the operation.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Is Mr. Thomas with you right now?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Yes, he's a bit shaken up still, but doesn't seem to have any injuries. Our medics are looking after him right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is he the informant you said could get us into Londinium?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Mr. Thomas, who used to own a candy plant in Londinium's Sudean borough, and his uncle who lives in Columbia, are long-time partners of Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: His uncle put in a request to bring Mr. Thomas back to Columbia. The last time we talked, we told Mr. Thomas that we'd bring someone to pick him up if he found some way to leave Londinium.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I just never expected...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...that Dublinn would hijack your aircraft. And by the way, they seem very interested in Mr. Thomas too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm, really?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I suppose that's because... Mr. Thomas is very familiar with Sudean–– It's the place closest to you with a point of entry and exit.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm sure he can help you find a suitable way in, and they're probably after him for very similar reasons.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Right. I'll ask if he is willing to help us, once he's rested up.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Umm... say again please? We've lost contact with the team sent to link up with the embassy? I, I see... Sorry, Amiya, but something just came up...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's alright. Take care of what you have to do first. We'll go talk to Mr. Thomas.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: D-Do your best... Um, I hope that doesn't come off the wrong way... Maybe there's a better way to say it...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Amiya... and you too, Doctor. Good luck.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Mr. Thomas?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So you're... the one.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Which one?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We didn't expect you to come so quickly. Hmm... Quite an unexpected surprise.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Were we quick...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've been worried about you ever since we heard from Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: By the way, Mr. Thomas, are you feeling unwell at all?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I just noticed that your expression... looks a bit different now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Aha... Haha. I might've gotten a bit ahead of myself.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: What I meant to say is, thank you.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Madam, you and your subordinates saved me. I have no doubt that you are good people.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: There's no need to thank us. If you're a partner to Blacksteel, you're also a partner to us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And... there's something else I need your opinion on.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have work that needs doing inside Londinium. On our way here, we heard a little bit about what's going on inside the city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right now, Londinium isn't allowing anybody into the city without authorization.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: From the perspective of outside visitors like us, those high walls are an impossible obstacle.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've tried a few methods already, but it's far too difficult for a small business like ours to pass through a military blockade.
attributes.name: Amiya
Amiya
attributes.content: As you can see, we have only a few office clerks with us, and we would like to know if there is a...

attributes.name: Amiya
attributes.content: Safe way to get inside Londinium.
attributes.joined: As you can see, we have only a few office clerks with us, and we would like to know if there is a... Safe way to get inside Londinium.

attributes.content: You're... you're trying to get INSIDE Londinium? You know, the people inside are desperately trying to escape... Those damned Sarkaz, they're just too horrible!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: I understand that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And it's why I'm not going to force you to help us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm also not going to lie to you and try to cover up the potential dangers of working with us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But if you're willing to show us the way, we'll escort you to Blacksteel's evacuation team, once all is said and done.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If you don't want to go back, we won't blame you. You can go ahead and leave right now, and we'll look for another way into the city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course I...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.options: If you leave, you may bump into Dublinn.;I understand the way out isn't exactly very safe.

attributes.content: Of course I'll choose to work with you!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (I never intended to threaten him... If he didn't want to help us, I would've arranged for someone to escort him...)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: (I know.);(I was just stating the facts.)

attributes.content: Looks like we found our guide?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: That's right, Amiya's making moves.;Mr. Thomas agreed to cooperate with us just now.

attributes.content: It's time for our homecoming.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Closure, go ahead and call your drones back.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Woah... Are we finally going to start the operation?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's not safe to stay outside the city for too long either.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thanks to Misery's intel, we've largely been able to bypass Dublinn's troops.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But we just got into a fight with Dublinn, and judging from previous experiences, the leader of that squad can be a bit... vengeful.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You think they'll come after us?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I can't say for sure. That depends on whether or not they give up on Mr. Thomas.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if we successfully enter the city, we might end up having to fight the Sarkaz troops garrisoned inside and Dublinn's forces at the same time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh, if only I could splash a coat of stealth paint on our operators too...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We'll be fine. We've already done everything we can to prepare for this day.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, please stand beside me. Just like always, I won't let anyone hurt you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let's... get ready to move out.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Attention, all members of Special Ops Squad Amiya––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We are now heading directly for the port at Sudean, Londinium!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Captain, I've checked our surroundings, and there are no signs of any Londiniers.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: In other words, your entire squad wasn't enough to stop a few people, and you even let them take our crucial objective.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Captain...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Rubbish... the whole lot of you!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Ma'am...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Stop sniveling, it's irritating. When have you ever seen me hurt my own people? Besides, I'm not mad at you, I'm mad at myself.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Even something as minor as this... Not a single thing has gone smoothly since we've come to Londinium.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Those... damned Sarkaz... Those meddlesome nobles too...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: And then there's that blasted Victorian soldier... the one they call 'Horn'...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: It's all Harmonie's fault. She forced me to bring the wolf along to Londinium, with all that talk about how she'd be able to use the soldier to buy the support of some nobles sitting on the fence if she were to come here...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: If I knew she was going to run away and continue to be a thorn in our side, I would've killed her right there at County Hillock!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Captain, this time, um... I don't think it was her...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: It wasn't?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: According to the survivors, the attackers were people we had never seen before. They didn't appear to be Victorian military either.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: So what you're telling me is a couple of nobodies can appear out of thin air and snatch a man from right under our noses.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I-It's completely our fault, Captain! We'll track them down right away...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Hold it! Stop bumbling around. We're about to leave this place.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: We're leaving...?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Otherwise? Do you plan on bunkering down on this street? We're not ready to go masks-off with the Sarkaz yet.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Also, I promised Harmonie that I'd let the nobles keep some of their stupid pride.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: It's all... for the sake of Dublinn. For the Leader.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Understood, Captain.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: You say you understand, but deep down, you don't understand anything at all. Otherwise, how would you have let that Londinier get away? Do you have any idea how important the information he has on him is?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Uhh... He was the one driving for the Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Yes... driving.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: If he can drive for the Sarkaz, that obviously means he knows his way around!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: He can help us find the ones we're looking for. Our compatriots who are still in Sarkaz hands... but are of great importance to us!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Why do you think I'm swallowing my disgust and dealing with the Sarkaz here in Londinium? Just the way they look at us makes me want to run them through with stones a hundred times over!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: It's just because... after coming all this way, I can finally do something useful for the Leader!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I... I'm sorry, Captain...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: A driver, a driver... Hmph, you just reminded me of something.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: The ones who snatched him from us... Were they also looking for a guide?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Captain, do you mean...?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: We're turning back right now.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I want to see if I come across any familiar faces at the port.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Say, for example... that bloody Victorian soldier.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Not so fast, you lot.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Once the Captain comes back and we get some reliable information, then we'll let you go.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: To be honest, I'd rather not raise a hand against you. You've been slaves to the Sarkaz for so long, you can't even be called soldiers anymore.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: But it's not my call. If we can't get any useful information out of you, the boss won't want to keep you around.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: And I can't let you go either. What if you fall into Sarkaz hands again and spill our plans?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I say, how about...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: You join Dublinn?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Never mind. If you were Tarans, the boss would've had you change clothes already.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: It's up to you whether or not you believe me. I, for one, would rather be out there killing Sarkaz than interrogating you bunch.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Look, Londinium's fallen into the hands of the devils. And who is to blame for that? Old friend, I heard you barely even put up a fight. You just surrendered to the Sarkaz, one by one.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Who made the Victorian Army, once the scourge of all of Terra, so weak and pathetic?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Where's your commander? Still wearing a fancy uniform, off drinking with the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: ...Nngh!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: The commanders were right. Victoria really is rotten to the core. Without us cauterizing it, this great place will turn into a swamp of rotten detritus that won't even burn.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Soldier, you should feel grateful that you get to die at the hands of your former countrymen.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: At least your pride as a Victorian soldier won't be tarnished by the stench of those devils.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: ––You people betrayed Victoria, and still have the gall to pay lip service to pride?
Who's there?!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I won't let you lay a finger on our troops.
The occupiers are unworthy, and you, Dublinn, are even less worthy.
You... You're... the one who fled...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Urgh!!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: The eighth nest has been wiped out.
You're... here to save us?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Stand up, soldier.
Let's get out of here first.
...Soldier?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: You're... a lieutenant? Which company are you with?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: I didn't think we still had anyone...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Rita Skamandros, 7th Frontline Infantry Battalion, 2nd Tempest Platoon Leader.
Or,

attributes.name: Horn
attributes.content: Horn, if it pleases you.
